title: Deadly Circus Fire - The King and The Bishop
description:
Deadly Circus Fire - The King and The Bishop


Releasedate: 2013-09-21
Label:  Self-Release



Deadly Circus Fire is a four-piece English progressive metal band. The King and The Bishop is the first DCF's studio album. Firstly scheduled to be released on March 2012, its release has been postponed for the 2013, due to issues related to the master. It has been digitally released worldwide on 1 June 2013 and it's due to be physically released as special edition with Metal Hammer on 20 August 2013 issue. The album features 10 tracks divided in two chapters. 

CHAPTER ONE:
01. Through the Soil (i.Born ii.Damned iii.Requiem) 
02. Her Epitaph (iv.The Return)
03. Nothing 
04. Blackout 
05. In the Kingdom of Flies

CHAPTER TWO:
06. The King and The Bishop 
07. Black Mask 
08. Threnody 
09. Leviathan 
10. The Light Within


Enjoy // Kay
